text: Imam Bagus Kurnia (born 22 July 1995) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 2 club Sriwijaya. ==Career== ===Sriwijaya=== He was signed for Sriwijaya to played in Liga 2 on 2020 season. ==References== ==External links== * * Imam Bagus Kurnia at Liga Indonesia Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Madura United F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football wingers Category:Indonesian footballers
title: Imam Bagus Kurnia
